scene_description_enriched: The image depicts a male saint, identifiable by his halo, standing in a landscape. He is holding an open book in his left hand and a palm frond, a symbol of martyrdom, in his right. He wears a golden robe adorned with red scrollwork and a green collar, over a white tunic. The background features rolling green hills, a body of water with a small boat, and a distant city with towers. Trees are scattered throughout the landscape, and rocky formations are visible on the left. The scene is framed by an ornamental border.
